title: Monitoring Mine Action Conventions
description: Funding under this investment will support the core work of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines and the Cluster Munitions Coalition which analyses and reports on the situation of anti-personnel mines and cluster munitions including casualties across the globe and advocates for and monitors implementation of the Mine Ban Convention and the Cluster Munitions Convention. The total value of this investment is $0.4 million over 3 years, starting 2014-15.
